name: @jambonz/ui
description: jambonz UI component and design style library

scripts.build:styles: sass src/styles/index.scss css/styles.css && sass src/styles/index.scss css/styles.min.css --style=compressed
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && rm -rf test-app/dist
scripts.posttestbuild: yarn package && cp test-app/index.html test-app/dist/index.html && cp -R fonts test-app/dist/fonts
scripts.package: cp package.json pkg/package.json && mkdir pkg/public && mv css pkg/public/css && mv dist pkg/dist && mv build pkg/build && cp -R fonts pkg/public/fonts && cp -R src pkg/src
scripts.postpackage: gzip --stdout pkg/public/css/styles.min.css > pkg/public/css/styles.min.css.gz && cp -R pkg/build pkg/public/js
